extendedInfo.description: Coaches,The FREE APP IS OUT NOW but THIS ONE IS NOT FREE!!!! Go back to the play store or follow the link of the guru below!!!!!This is the premium membership My fantasy Football Guru appThe only difference between the free app and the paid app is the premium membership allows and encouraged end user participation as well as ability to ask questions. That is the only difference.In a couple of days look for the free My Fantasy Football Guru app on the market or you can visit our website.  At the website you can register for free and get email alerts and take part in other areas regarding fantasy football.www.myfantasyfootballguru.com  many more features on the website including live ticker, Ask the Guru for 1 to 1 questions, weekly waiver wire list, rankings, and more.  myfantasyfootballguru@gmail.com for issues, concerns, letter to your parole officer recommending fantasy football as a therapeutic activity- whatvercome say hi twitter @myffguruThat is all- time to fight. Break is over. Kiss the spouse on the forehead and say goodbye for next 5 months.Butcher

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Loved it before the update now it force closes fix and its five stars. I got the paid version help man my leagues need this. IT\'S FIXED
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashing every time now
reviews.comment: Asks me to log and pay every time enen tho i already paid!!! Guru please fix. It crashes everytime. I cant even get past the home screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: LOL its not free
reviews.comment: Absolutely no clue why he would say \"a free fantasy football resource brought to you by a very handsome Guru\" ?.....Really, its free?...you have to pay to log in, how does that equate to free.....It might be the best app on the planet but since it is not what it says it is (FREE), it gets a big fat goose egg from me....0 stars until an actual free or trial version makes its way onto the market so I can test it before I pay such a high price....Smells a bit fishy to me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please don\'t use this app if you\'re in any of my 10 leagues!
reviews.comment: AWESOME APP! KEEP THE GREAT INFO COMING!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Championships are made here
reviews.comment: If you are looking to rule your league, this is the app you must own! Fantastic advice from one of the best fantasy football experts around!! Guru Conde Butcher is tha man!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dear never satisifed
reviews.comment: Hey...the free app will be re released in a couple of days. Its totally free and is EXACTLY the same as paid but you can\'t ask questions or interact. Stop your belly aching...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great info BAD app
reviews.comment: App sux! Force closes a lot. Never any updates to fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Championship!!
reviews.comment: Not a better fantasy football app anywhere! I think he really has a crystal ball! Small price to pay to stay on top in your league.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love my Guru
reviews.comment: With crash issue fixed,  what\'s not to love!  Guru Conde is so great to work with whether you are a newbie or an old hand. I am the former and he never makes me feel like an idiot,  he just encourages me to keep fighting.  Up to date alerts of happenings in the league so you get a jump on the others.  Buy a membership but don\'t tell anyone lol.- Coach Katy :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: GURU CONDE BUTCHER IS THE MAN
reviews.comment: First of all, to all the haters who complain about the app functionality, and the fact his website crashed (in turn making all apps crash) because it got TOO POPULAR for the bandwidth... for ONE day... and it wasn\'t even a Sunday... you all can suck it.  For anyone who wants a real, unbiased look at Fantasy Football, with strategic, smart and priceless advice to boot... this IS the app.  It\'s not just about one guy who thinks he\'s a fantasy god, it\'s about a community of fantasy junkies who use Mr. Guru as a channel in which to communicate breaking news directly related to your teams success. It\'s about a real look at rankings, who to cut, who to buy, and who to incubate...  I believe that the Guru, the true center of the flourishing community, cares about nothing except football and OUR teams. I believe he sits, in his underwear, with a box of pizza, a thousand televisions, in his mom\'s basement, making his wife communicate to him via notepad, eyes bloodshot, laptop in lap, and never sees the light of day from August to February.  Go from beginner to pro, go from veteran to wise. I did. Pay the 10 bucks, you\'ll want to pay more. He won\'t remain a well kept secret for long.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love the app but still having crash problems
reviews.comment: I love the app so glad I found out about it and made the investment. However still having crash problems. Anytime I open the app I have to force close and having problems posting questions and comments. Aside from that I LOVE THIS APP!! Please fix issues developers I have the Galaxy S Fascinate
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app Conde ......
reviews.comment: This app is awesome!!!! It helps all levels of coaches, the best app I found by far. If your looking for an app that provides good Info an up to date barks on who to go grab I recommend 100%.... Thanks Guru keep up the good work.... \"  IN IT TO WIN IT\"
reviews.author: Shane Travers

reviews.title: Free app
reviews.comment: When is the free version going to drop.last two years this was invaluable a must have for any ff player

reviews.title: Fix crashes
reviews.comment: Great app when it was free. Now I paid $10 and out force closes every single time. Fix issue and 5 stars.
